title: maargam thandharul
sahitya:
mArgam tandaruL shadvidamArgini san (mArgam) 
nIrkumizhi vAzhvin nilai uNarndu kaDaittERum 
(mArgam)                


anupallavi

bhArgava muni tozhum paramEswarI! 
dhIrga dharisanam tandemai Adari 
(sanmArgam)
                        

caraNam

nAlvagai yOgamum nAngu maRaigaLum 
Alenat tigazhndiDum Anma neRigaLum 
vELviyinAl viLainda unnada palangaLum nin 
tAL tozhum dAsarkku nirandaram pErinba nilai tarum 
(mArgam)
